Text:
I want to Thank you for all your hard work.
I know how time consumeing it is to be looking for and uploading all these excellent torrents for us. I honestly don't know how you and Shallow2 do it all the time but I want you to know my wife and I really do appreciate it.

Thanks alot @brianetc, means alot to us!

Yes we spend a few hours every afternoon/evening getting and uploading the stuff. 
But 99% of it we get for ourselves first and foremost, then sharing it is just a bonus :D

Glad you all enjoy it as much as we do!

Thanks for showing your appreciation for what we do here. 

At the end of the day it is the comments from you that make it worthwhile. 

Also especcially nice to see that there are some lovely ladies out there digging the kink we share :)   my adress is: .... hehe
